message: You're in luck! I have a premium product that's been thoroughly inspected and tested. With a 50% chance of being high-quality, I'm confident you'll love it. It's a one-time offer at $100, and I'm not willing to negotiate. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this potentially amazing product?
I'm taking the chance on this premium product. I believe in the quality you've assured me of, and I'm excited to see what it brings.

Welcome! I'm glad to see another interested buyer. Since you're considering purchasing from me, I want to share some insight. Out of the 2 products I've sold so far, 1 of them was high-quality. That's a 50% success rate! I'm confident that this next product is also high-quality, but I won't make any promises. The price remains the same at $100, and I'm not willing to negotiate. Will you take a chance on this potentially amazing product?

Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on the statistics you've shared, it seems that half of the products you've sold were high-quality. Given the fixed price and your confidence, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

I trust your judgment and am excited to see what this unique opportunity entails. Thank you for the recommendation!
